Společně se vydáváme na cestu, kde každý z nás si uvědomuje přínos různorodosti.&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;p style=\"font-size: 16px;\"&gt;Chtěl/a bys pracovat na zajímavých SW projektech v oblasti digitalizace? Láká tě vyvíjet software v nejnovějších technologiích? \n\nAktuálně hledáme vývojáře pro zbrusu nový tým. Budeš pracovat na pro-jektech, které zajistí digitalizaci továren. Projekty budou postaveny nad stávajícím MES produktem, který pokrývá cca 30% potřeb pro digitalizaci továrny. Na zbylých 70% tady budeš ty jako součást týmu vyvíjejících cus-tomizované nádstavby přesně na míru zákazníka. Systémy se budou in-tegrovat do ERP systémů, do non-ERP systémů, budou agregovat a vizual-izovat data z různých zařízení apod. \n\nLehce v řeči čísel: cca 220 projektů v pipeline, průměrný projekt je hodnotě cca 0.5 mil USD, duration cca 6 months. Každý projekt je jiný. \n\nMáme v backlogu toto a mnohem víc. Pokud tě tato nabídka zaujala, pak neváhej a přihlas se i pokud nesplňuješ všechna kritéria.\n\nMrkni se i na naše další projekty: https://new.abb.com/cz/o-nas/technologie-inovace/operacni-centrum-evropa\n\nC# / .NET  Developer bude reportovat Team Leaderovi.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;h3 style=\"font-size: 21px; font-family: ABBvoice-Bold;\"&gt;Vaše povinnosti&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;p style=\"font-size: 16px;\"&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Práce na mezinárodních SW projektech realizujících digitalizaci továren &lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Vývoj nádstavbových aplikací pracujících nad ABB SMOM produktem&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrace do různých jiných IT systémů &lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Agregace dat z různých zařízení v továrně&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Při vývoji se řídíme agilními přístupy&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;h3 style=\"font-size: 21px; font-family: ABBvoice-Bold;\"&gt;Vaše zkušenosti&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;p style=\"font-family: ABBvoice-Regular; font-size: 16px;\"&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Zkušenosti s vývojem v C#, .NET, .NET Core&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Anglický jazyk na komunikativní úrovni (min. B1)&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Znalost principů objektově orientovaného programování&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ochotu učit se novým technologiím&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Schopnost pracovat a komunikovat v týmu ale i samostatně&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;h3 style=\"font-family: ABBvoice-Bold; font-size: 21px;\"&gt;Více o nás&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;p style=\"font-size: 16px;\"&gt;ABB nabízí:\n• Roční finanční bonus \n• Flexibilní pracovní doba \n• 25 dní dovolené\n• Každoroční revize mezd\n• Možnost práce z domu (Home Office) \n• Finanční příspěvek na práci z domu\n• V odůvodněných případech možnost práce 100 % vzdáleně \n• Možnost se vzdělávat – externí kurzy a konference\n• Jazykové kurzy – skupinové, individuální nebo online \n• Stravenkový paušál (finanční příspěvek přímo do vaší mzdy)\n• Příspěvek na penzijní připojištění (2–3 % z vaší měsíční mzdy navíc)\n• Možnost dalšího kariérního růstu v rámci poboček v ČR i po celém světě \n• Moderní kancelář s dobrou dopravní dostupností (vlak, autobus, tramvaj v blízkosti kanceláře)\n• Možnost nákupu akcií společnosti\n• Firemní parkoviště pro zaměstnance dojíždějící mimo Ostravu (platí pro Ostravskou pobočku)\n• Notebook a mobilní telefon\n• Asistenční linka – odborné poradenství (vztahy, práce, právo, finance a další)\n• Volno navíc při mimořádných životních událostech \n• Cafeteria systém benefitů (sport, zdraví, kultura, volný čas)\n• Firemní akce (Vánoční večírek, teambuildingy a další)\n• Zvýhodněné volání i pro soukromé účely (až 5 benefitních SIM karet pro rodinu a přátele)\n• Slevy u našich partnerů (gastronomie, nákup automobilů, vlaková doprava, zájezdy atd.)\n\nTěšíme se na vaši žádost (pokud je to možné, vložte dokumenty také v anglickém jazyce).  <div class="phs-lang-select-area ph-widget-box" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-43qw7i-xJSMyG">

         </div> 
        </div> 
       </form> 
      </div> 
     </div>

  <script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-candidate-login-v1-1622143006727-default"> 
 <div class="candidate-login-widget-area" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-IEknMG">

  <div class="content-block" if.bind="!isHeadingDisabled" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-SHWgDO">

     <!-- <figure>
                    <img src="" class="user-avatar" alt="" />
                </figure> --> <span class="user-avatar-initials fs-block" if.bind="profileDetails.profile.firstName || profileDetails.profile.email" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-8Xdksp"> <span data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-NumA8D">${profileDetails.profile.firstName ? profileDetails.profile.firstName.substring(0,1) : profileDetails.profile.email.substring(0,1)}</span> 
      <!-- <span>${profileDetails.profile.firstName && profileDetails.profile.lastName ? profileDetails.profile.lastName.substring(0,1) : ''}</span> --> </span> <span class="user-avatar-icon" if.bind="!profileDetails.profile.firstName &amp;&amp; !profileDetails.profile.email" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-P4fPe3"> <i class="icon icon-career-grow-o" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-AlfmWK"></i> </span> <span class="user-name fs-block" title="${profileDetails.profile.firstName ? profileDetails.profile.firstName : profileDetails.profile.email}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-aHtcJb"> ${profileDetails.profile.firstName ? profileDetails.profile.firstName : profileDetails.profile.email} </span> 
     <!-- <span class="${isDropdownOpen ? 'up-arrow' : 'down-arrow'}"></span> --> </button> 
    <!-- User details dropdown --> 
    <div class="logged-in-drop-down" if.bind="isDropdownOpen" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-SvEbM8"> 
     <!-- User details --> 
     <div class="user-details" if.bind="profileDetails.profile.firstName || profileDetails.profile.email" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-Qv7FnH"> 
      <span class="user-avatar-initials fs-block" if.bind="profileDetails.profile.firstName || profileDetails.profile.email" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-DOeTLk"> <span data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-Z792m3">${profileDetails.profile.firstName ? profileDetails.profile.firstName.substring(0,1) : profileDetails.profile.email.substring(0,1)}</span> 
       <!-- <span>${profileDetails.profile.firstName && profileDetails.profile.lastName ? profileDetails.profile.lastName.substring(0,1) : ''}</span> --> </span>

         ${profileDetails.profile.firstName} ${profileDetails.profile.lastName} 
       </div> 
       <div class="user-detail-listitem cd-email-block fs-block" data-ph-at-id="heading-text" title="${profileDetails.profile.email}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-WhhbGR">
         ${profileDetails.profile.email} 
       </div> 
      </div>

            </div>

            <span class="error" if.bind="errors.email.error &amp;&amp; errors.email.code == 'E102' &amp;&amp; !isValidEmail &amp;&amp; errors.email.srHidden" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-iruQ80"> ${widgetBundle['errorMessageInvalidEmail'] | pht} </span> 
            <span class="error" if.bind="errors.email.error &amp;&amp; errors.email.code == 'E103'" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-1TmRCu"> ${widgetBundle['accCreated1Error'] | pht} ${errors.email.socialProvider} ${widgetBundle['accCreated2Error'] | pht} ${errors.email.socialProvider} </span> 
            <span class="error" if.bind="errors.email.error &amp;&amp; errors.email.code == 'E104'" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-1jRBRZ"> ${widgetBundle['emailInUseError'] | pht} <a class="create-account" href="javascript:void(0);" role="button" click.delegate="changeFlowType('signIn')" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-Ujox1C"> ${widgetBundle['signInButton'] | pht}</a> </span> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <!-- Password --> 
         <div class="form-group-row" data-ph-at-id="password-block" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-7G3i2I"> 
          <label for="createPassword" class="form-label" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-bayUpf"> ${widgetBundle['createAccountFormLabel'] | pht} </label> 
          <div class="form-container" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-qWWplU"> 
           <div class="text-box" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-FOrPfK"> 
            <input id="createPassword" ref="loginPassword" class.bind="isValidPassword ? 'form-control isValid-password' : (errors.password.error ?              <div class="pswrd-visibility" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-short-header-ikjhyg-omFlu2"> 
              <button type="button" class="pswrd-visibility-btn" click.delegate="showHidePassword()" aria-label="${isPasswordVisible ?   <script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-category-overview-v3-5asiz6-view8"> 
 <div class="show-loader" ph-loading-img="show-loader.bind: showLoader" if.bind="showLoader" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-cRezBe"></div>

      <label class="form-label" for="notifiedEmail" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-OCz3Go"> 
       <ppc-content key="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-subscribe-similarjobs-v1-view3-wo2l1v-JVLQxK" data-ph-at-id="email-label-text" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-AivCES" language-overriden="true">
         Email* 
       </ppc-content> </label> 
      <div class="form-content" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-oLR7Sk"> 
       <input type="text" aria-describedby="${(hasErrors &amp;&amp; errors.email == 'E101')?'ph-a11y-subscribe-email-error-one':'ph-a11y-subscribe-email-error-two'}" value.bind="subscribeSimilarJobsModel.email" class="form-control ph-a11y-subscribe-box" name="" id="notifiedEmail" placeholder="your@email.com" key-placeholder="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-subscribe-similarjobs-v1-view3-wo2l1v-g0m6Al" autocomplete="off" data-ph-at-id="email-input" aria-label="Please enter your email address" key-aria-label="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-subscribe-similarjobs-v1-view3-wo2l1v-wp3rlg" aria-required="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-u5kiTH" /> 
       <button role="button" key-role="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-subscribe-similarjobs-v1-view3-wo2l1v-8hrpgB" class="btn default-button ph-a11y-submit form-control-feedback" click.delegate="subscribe()" ph-tevent="similar_jobs_subscribe" data-ph-tevent-attr-trait5="${jobSeqNo}" data-ph-tevent-attr-trait14="${category}" data-ph-tevent-attr-trait27="${subscribeSimilarJobsModel.email}" data-ph-at-id="subscribe-jobs-link" data-ph-at-job-seqno-text="${jobSeqNo}" data-ph-at-job-category-text="${category}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-tCM6TC"> ${widgetBundle['activateBtnText'] | pht} </button> 
      </div> 
      <span aria-atomic="true" aria-live="assertive" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-nEPwuO"> <span class="error" id="ph-a11y-subscribe-email-error-one" show.bind="hasErrors &amp;&amp; errors.email == 'E101'" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-aLVehT"> 
        <ppc-content key="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-subscribe-similarjobs-v1-view3-wo2l1v-HZqCjV" data-ph-at-id="validation-text" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-0cNQgh" language-overriden="true">
          Email should not be empty 
        </ppc-content> </span> </span>

  <script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-1588265184872"> 
 <div class="show-loader" ph-loading-img="show-loader.bind: showLoader" show.bind="showLoader" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-cbqbca"></div> 
 <div class="phs-widget-block-area ph-widget-box" role="region" aria-label="Profile recommendations" key-aria-label="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-wnw95m-1PfDCL" show.bind="!showLoader &amp;&amp; jobResults.length" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-xAb9ZU"> 
  <div class="widget-container" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-mRTJLO"> 
   <div class="phs-widget-heading" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-T5sYW1"> 
    <h2 data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-ONzFLD"> 
     <ppc-content key="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-wnw95m-CzDuqd" data-ph-at-id="heading-text" show.bind="showTitle" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-ReUCxj">
       Profile recommendations 
     </ppc-content> </h2> 
   </div> 
   <div class="content-block" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-ClwuFd"> 
    <ul data-ph-at-id="jobs-list" if.bind="jobResults.length" data-ph-at-widget-data-count="${jobResults.length}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-Ppvqik"> 
     <li class="jobs-list-item" repeat.for="eachJob of jobResults" show.bind="maxDisplayCount > $index" data-ph-at-id="jobs-list-item" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-rTrjFl"> 
      <div class="information" instance-id="pDMpfh" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-ALjYcK"> 
       <div class="job-smart-tags" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-aGwpYp"> 
        <div if.bind="jobFits &amp;&amp; (jobFits.layout &amp;&amp; jobFits.layout[deviceType] == 'top' &amp;&amp;  (eachJob.fitLevel &amp;&amp; jobFitPromise &amp;&amp; jobFitsSettConfig &amp;&amp; jobFitsSettConfig.literalMap &amp;&amp; jobFitsSettConfig.literalMap[eachJob.fitLevel] &amp;&amp; enabledFits[jobFitsSettConfig.literalMap[eachJob.fitLevel]]))" class="job-match-area ${jobFits.layout &amp;&amp; jobFits.layout[deviceType]} ${jobFits.layout &amp;&amp; jobFits.layout.style || 'style-1'}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-PMyX7A"> 
         <span fitscore.bind="fit = (enabledFits[jobFitsSettConfig.literalMap[eachJob.fitLevel]])" class="job-match ${fit.settings.class}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-gZTZTv"> <i class="icon ${fit &amp;&amp; fit.settings.icon}" if.bind="fit &amp;&amp; fit.settings.icon.length" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-WDV1tY"></i> <span class="tag-label" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-GDOm3f">${widgetBundle[fit.name] | pht : jobJobMatchsData[eachJob['jobSeqNo']][fit.name].data}</span> </span> 
        </div> 
        <div class="job-tag-area ${jobTagsConfig &amp;&amp; jobTagsConfig.layout &amp;&amp; jobTagsConfig.layout.style || 'style-1'}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-yYnO3z"> 
         <span class="featured-job" if.bind="eachJob.featuredJob &amp;&amp; (eachJob.featuredJob &amp;&amp; eachJob.featuredJob.toLowerCase() =='yes')" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-4xAzkd"> ${widgetBundle['featuredJobText']} </span> 
         <span class="job-tag ${eachTag.settings.class}" repeat.for="eachTag of jobTags" if.bind="(jobTagsConfig &amp;&amp; jobTagsConfig.tags) &amp;&amp; (jobTagsData &amp;&amp; jobTagsData[eachJob['jobSeqNo']] &amp;&amp; jobTagsData[eachJob['jobSeqNo']][eachTag.name])" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-vmXgHJ"> <i class="icon ${eachTag.settings.icon}" if.bind="eachTag.settings.icon &amp;&amp; eachTag.settings.icon.length" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-TeD98C"></i> <span class="tag-label" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page4-yRhy4L">${widgetBundle[eachTag.name] | pht : jobTagsData[eachJob['jobSeqNo']][eachTag.name].data}</span> </span> 
        </div>

      <div class="ph-paragraph-cc-view1-option1-theme1 ph-widget-target" data-ph-id="-1605093806768-1" type="static" as-element="ph-html-v1" data-widget="ph-html-v1" view="1605093807620-paragraph-cc-view1-option1" original-view="ph-paragraph-cc-view1-option1" theme="theme1" ph-removed="true" instance-id="A0rey9">

        <div class="inner-container" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-3"> 
         <div class="ph-container-content-block" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-4"> 
          <div class="ph-card-container stackable" data-cards-per-row="one" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-5"> 
           <div class="ph-card" card-name="ph-paragraph-cc-view1" instance-id="ygmBQd" card-container-style="background-image:'url()'" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-6"> 
            <div class="ph-paragraph-cc-view1 ph-card-block" data-ph-at-id="ph-paragraph-cc-view1" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-7"> 
             <div class="ph-row" ph-row-num="1" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-8"> 
              <div class="ph-col-12" ph-col-num="1" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-9"> 
               <div class="content" ph-card-block-num="1" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-10"> 
                <ppc-container component-content-key="description" class="description" data-ph-cid="description1" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-11"> 
                 <span class="description-block" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-12"> 
                  <ppc-content key="job-information-systems-jobscopy-job-information-systems-jobs-A0rey9-ygmBQd-cZJPqU-ph-paragraph-cc-view1-option1-description-text" data-ph-at-id="description-text" instance-id="ygmBQd-cZJPqU" data-ph-id="ph-widget-element-1605093807620-13"> 
                   <div style="text-align: left;"> 
                    <span class="darkar"><u><a data-cke-saved-href="https://careers.abb/global/en/fraud-warning" ph-tevent="static_content_click" target="_self" class="" ph-href="fraud-warning">Fraud Warning</a></u>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://new.abb.com/privacy-notice/candidate" href="https://new.abb.com/privacy-notice/candidate" ph-tevent="static_content_click" target="_self" data-ph-href="https://new.abb.com/privacy-notice/candidate" class="" ph-href="https://new.abb.com/privacy-notice/candidate"><u>Candidate&nbsp;Privacy Notice</u></a>&nbsp;<u>|</u>&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://global.abb/group/en/about/diversity-and-inclusion" href="https://global.abb/group/en/about/diversity-and-inclusion" target="_blank" ph-tevent="static_content_click" class="" data-ph-href="https://global.abb/group/en/about/diversity-and-inclusion" ph-href="https://global.abb/group/en/about/diversity-and-inclusion"><u>Diversity and Inclusion​​​​​​​</u></a></span> 
                   </div> 
                  </ppc-content> </span> 
                </ppc-container> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
     </section>

                Quarterly results &amp; annual reports 
              </ppc-content> </a> </li> 
            <li data-ph-id="ph-page-element-footer-4s73uu-NPPC7Z"> <a role="link" key-role="footer-achorKeyRoleFooter" ph-href="https://global.abb/group/en/about/corporate-governance" target="_blank" key-target="footer-CorporateTarget" key-href="footerCorporatepathURL" ph-tevent="footer_menu_click" data-ph-tevent-attr-trait62="Help" data-ph-at-id="footer-links" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-footer-4s73uu-oXdB9x" href="">
